title: I’m A Beautiful Woman In Men’s Clothes And A Villainess But I’m In Trouble ~ The Psychopathic Heroine Who Resembles My Lost Love Comes To Capture Me While Taming The Macho Man, The Masochist, The Idol Fanatic, And The Various Other Capture Targets~ - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Yuri
author: Tanaka Yoshio   田中義男
description: A short story about a girl reincarnated as the (beautiful maiden in men’s clothes) Villainess of an Otome Game, who is troubled every day by a Heroine trying to capture her.>
